constructor.details: Initializes the transaction broadcaster like this: - If $ETH_FROM is defined, use it. - Otherwise, derive the broadcaster address from $MNEMONIC. - If $MNEMONIC is not defined, default to a test mnemonic. The use case for $ETH_FROM is to specify the broadcaster key and its address via the command line.

documentation.text: @dev Included to enable compilation of the script without a $MNEMONIC environment variable.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "test test test test test test test test test test test junk"

value.value: test test test test test test test test test test test junk

documentation.text: @dev The address of the transaction broadcaster.
@dev Used to derive the broadcaster's address if $ETH_FROM is not defined.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory) external returns (string memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Initializes the transaction broadcaster like this:
 - If $ETH_FROM is defined, use it.
 - Otherwise, derive the broadcaster address from $MNEMONIC.
 - If $MNEMONIC is not defined, default to a test mnemonic.
 The use case for $ETH_FROM is to specify the broadcaster key and its address via the command line.
